about_the_game:
TICKDOWN is a fast-paced elemental FPS that blends together Arena FPS and Bullet Hell gameplay.

You are a counter-terrorist agent. You have two real-time hours to locate and defuse a weapon of mass destruction. Use the powers of Water, Earth, Fire, and Air to fight your way through hordes of enemies to reach your objective.

Utilize a fluid movement system to soar above your enemies, raining down destructive abilities from the air. At the same time, you heal yourself by taking damage. Balance movement and embracing the bullet hell to survive.

Abilities

You have access to 6 elemental abilities, with 4 unique attacks for each ability.

Combine your abilities together to form even more destructive ones:

  • Create a Whirlpool, freeze it into an Ice Storm, electrify the Ice Storm into a Lightning Storm, and then blow up the Lightning Storm to release a long range Shockwave

  • Create a Black Hole by electrifying an enemy's imploding corpse, and then dunk a Lightning Basketball into the Black Hole to trap enemies in a shatterable alternate dimension

  • Concentrate Air Pressure into a bubble that traps enemies and projectiles inside. Blow up the Pressure Bubble to Microwave all enemies trapped inside

  • Lots more combinations you can find through experimentation

Additionally, you can hijack enemy attacks to create even more unique abilities, such as lobbing up a Lightning Basketball to an enemy as they're performing a ground smash

Story

TICKDOWN has a unique multi-layered story set in a world where the entirety of Planet Earth got Isekai'd.

There is no hard time limit for beating the game (the story doesn't end just because you failed)

There are also secrets, lore books, and optional challenge fights for you to find through exploration.

Photosensitive content warning: TICKDOWN may not be suitable for those who may experience seizures when exposed to certain or intense visuals

name: TICKDOWN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3.1GHz AMD Ryzen 3 or 3.3GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 470 or GTX 1060
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3.5GHz AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 XT or RTX 2060
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1440p

short_description: TICKDOWN is a fast-paced FPS where you have two real-time hours to locate and defuse a weapon of mass destruction. Use the powers of Water, Earth, Fire, and Air to fight your way through hordes of deadly enemies to reach your objective.
